title: Berlinale Issues Statement Following Political Backlash
desc: Berlinale boss Tricia Tuttle has issued a statement following backlash, saying that artists should not Be 'expected to speak on every political issue

title: Giant jellyfish is spotted off Argentinan coast
desc: The jellyfish has a bell size of up to one meter in diameter, and its four arms can reach lengths of up to about ten meters.

title: Margot Robbie Good Genes or Good Docs?!
desc: Margot Robbie's looks over the years have soared to new Heights! The question is: Good Genes or Good Docs?!

title: England hope to avoid slip-up against Italy
desc: England have moved up to second in the table after a much-needed win over Scotland

title: BDO offers zero percent medical installments
desc: BDO cardholders can pay hospital bills with 0 percent installment plans at partner hospitals until 30 June 2026.

title: 'Absolute shocker' - Wayne Rooney slams VAR-less officials after series of errors in Newcastle's FA Cup win at Aston Villa
desc: Wayne Rooney launched a scathing attack on the standard of officiating in the FA Cup on Saturday, as Newcastle United overcame Aston Villa 3-1 in the fourth round despite multiple game-changing decisions going against them in the absence of VAR. The former Manchester United striker was particularly critical of a decision which saw a free kick given for a Lucas Digne handball which was clearly 'three yards inside' the penalty area.

title: Russia's bid to derail Ukraine peace talks after making shock demand
desc: Russia appears to be once again trying to stall progress over a possible peace deal to resolve the Ukraine war.

title: Anne Curtis, Solenn Heussaff celebrate Georgina Wilson's 40th birthday in Shanghai
desc:
Anne Curtis, Solenn Heussaff, and the rest of the It Girls, along with Raymond Gutierrez, BJ Pascual, Rajo Laurel, and more of their friends flew to Shanghai, China to celebrate Georgina Wilson's 40th birthday.
"This little trip reminded all of us that love and conversations is more than we need in our 40s :) so good to properly catch up with everyone and dance. Shanghai is such a magical place!" Solenn wrote in an Instagram post.
Meanwhile, Anne had a photoshoot during the trip inspired by Wong Kar-wai's film In the Mood for Love.
She wrote in her post, "We all made it

title: Sheep farmers call for more supports over dog attacks
desc: A Co Monaghan sheep-farming family is calling for new dog-control regulations and more supports for farmers who lose their sheep in dog attacks.
